Description: VINTAGE 1966 ALDENS HOLIDAY electric guitar made by HARMONY. Made in AMERICA, USA in the 1960's (AUG 4, 1966 on pickguard assembly). Model H-15, Bobkat, Silhouette series. It is 100% original and complete. It has some wear... scuffs, scratches, bumps, dings and spots around the body edge that has rubbed finish off. This guitar is in exceptional playing condition, especially when you consider it is over 50 years old. It comes with the original (rough, missing stitches) chipboard case you see in the pictures. Features include: Chrome hardware, open back tuners, 20 fret neck, 24 inch scale, rosewood fingerboard w/ pearly dot markers, two single coil pickups, 2 volume controls, 2 tone controls, rosewood bridge, single ply pickguard, sunburst finish. The frets and finger board look new. Neck is straight. Original Rowe Industries, DeArmond gold foil pickups and wiring harness. The pickups are strong, sound awesome and work great. All the electronics work, no scratchy pots. I have completely serviced the guitar... cleaned and polished the body and neck, cleaned the controls, oiled the tuners, cleaned and conditioned the fingerboard, cleaned and polished the frets, installed new Dean Markley cryogenic activated Blue Steel 10-52 strings, adjusted the bridge, etc. It plays great, DON'T MISS IT!! Buyer pays $29.95 shipping, insurance, PACKAGING and HANDLING to lower 48 states. Items over 2 lbs will ship Fed Ex ground, (no PO Boxes). Please take a look at the last picture and my other listings. I have a small collection of Harmony made guitars listed for sale... a have a really nice tobacco sunburst Harmony Bobkat Silhouette H-15 that is all original with the original chipboard case (SOLD), a second identical guitar that is being sold as a project for parts (SOLD), another similar guitar in redburst finish branded Holiday (Alden's catalog) and a Holiday H-19 Silhouette that was make in 1965 in the USA. If you like 60's and 70's guitar brands like Silvertone, Harmony, Kay, Airline, Eko, Crucianelli, Lyle, Greco, Ventura, Aria, Electra, Conrad, Concord, Ibanez, Penco, Heit, Bruno, Tokia, Pan, Univox, Kawai, Victoria, Domino, Conqueror, Decca, Kent, Kingston, Norma, Tempo or Teisco you will love these guitars. The following is common sense stuff, but needs mentioned: -If you have a concern with any item purchased, CONTACT ME IMMEDIATELY by phone or email. I always offer a full refund of the purchase amount. You should not have to live with something you are unhappy with for any reason. If you alter, modify, change or "repair" the item in anyway without my consent, you are accepting the item "as is", at the price paid. All items are packed for safety. Often requiring reassembly, tuning and/or adjusting. -If you receive an item that has been damaged in shipping, CONTACT ME IMMEDIATELY and save all the packaging. We will work through the claim together until things are right. -I can ship almost anywhere, but free shipping or a fixed shipping price is for the contiguous 48 states ONLY. If you have a foreign address, use an APO, live in Alaska, Puerto Rico, etc., message me for a shipping price BEFORE you buy. Due to the cost and risk of shipping I do not accept returns from outside the US. Once the package is delivered to the carrier, the foreign buyer is responsible for the item, including but not limited to taxes, fees, customs issues, delays, damage, lose, duty, etc.
Title: 1966 ALDENS HOLIDAY HARMONY BOBKAT GUITAR SILHOUETTE USA GOLD FOIL DeARMOND ROWE
ConditionDescription: ALL ORIGINAL, EXCEPTIONAL CONDITION.  NO REPAIRS OR ABUSE.  Comes with the original case.  Recently serviced and ready to play.
